attributes.action: Stop landlords for leasehold properties charging what they want for maintenance.
attributes.background: I have lived in my property for 3 years each year the maintenance has gone up by £100. The property has only 5 flats. We have a reserve account for any major work that needs doing. This year I have a bill of £3000 and have been told this is only half of what I will need.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a petition asking Parliament to change the law,  to regulate maintenance charges for leasehold properties.
